{{EVENT_THEME}}.description: Theme of the gala event (e.g., Hollywood, Gatsby, Masquerade)

{{EVENT_HOST}}.description: Name of the event host, entertainer, or MC

{{CONFERENCE_NAME}}.description: Full conference name for the announcement bar

{{CONFERENCE_DATE}}.description: Conference dates displayed in the announcement bar

{{CONFERENCE_VENUE}}.description: Conference venue for the announcement bar

{{HERO_TITLE_LINE1}}.description: First line of the hero title (theme name or prefix text)

{{HERO_TITLE_LINE2}}.description: Second line of the hero title displayed in large gold script

{{HERO_SUBTITLE}}.description: Subtitle below the hero title (e.g., host name)

{{EVENT_TAGLINE}}.default: Get Ready To Shine Under The Spotlight!
{{EVENT_TAGLINE}}.description: Tagline heading in the event details section

{{VENUE_NAME}}.default: The Ballroom at the Sandton Convention Centre

{{EVENT_DATE_FULL}}.description: Full date of the gala event

{{SECRETARIAT_TITLE}}.description: Title of the secretariat/contact accordion section

{{SECRETARIAT_NAME}}.description: Name of the conference secretariat contact person

{{SECRETARIAT_COMPANY}}.description: Company name of the conference organizer

{{SECRETARIAT_PHONE}}.description: Phone number for the conference secretariat

{{SECRETARIAT_EMAIL}}.description: Email address for the conference secretariat

{{EMAIL}}.description: General contact email displayed in footer

{{PHONE}}.description: General contact phone displayed in footer
